toc_entry.title: Animal Attractions
toc_entry.description: These seven creatures might be piggy-backed, whale-boned, dog-toothed, goat-eed, elephant-eared, turtle-necked, and bull-headed, but they’re stars just the same.

toc_entry.title: Can Kids On Drugs Be Saved?
toc_entry.description: Drug treatment seldom works; at many centers, greedy entrepreneurs prey on frightened parents and troubled kids. But one teenager’s parents decided to take one last, desperate step: They sent their son to the toughest program in Texas.

toc_entry.title: The Old Man And the Secret
toc_entry.description: Thirty years ago, people couldn’t believe it: The old man’s elixir boosted crops, ate up sewage, and made the desert bloom. Today half a dozen Texas companies claim the elixir does all that and a whole lot more. And some people are beginning to believe it.

toc_entry.title: The Fab Flacks
toc_entry.description: The nouvelle stars of Houston society are none other than Becca Cason and Holly Moore, the founders of the hippest, most with-it Pr machine in the city.

toc_entry.title: Western Fling
toc_entry.description: With the cultural diversions of a big city and the country comforts of a small town. Fort Worth is the perfect place for a typically Texan weekend.

toc_entry.title: The Lost Pyramids
toc_entry.description: An intrepid explorer searching out Mayan ruins in the Yucatan remains undaunted, despite the language, the unkind elements, and other tropical afflictions.

toc_entry.title: Blood Brothers
toc_entry.subtitle: Health
toc_entry.description: For the sake of pharmaceutical research —and some extra bucks—I took a new drug. The only catch was, I had to give up two cups of blood and three weekends.

toc_entry.title: One Tough Bird
toc_entry.subtitle: Environment
toc_entry.description: After rescuing hundreds of birds from horrible deaths, a Midland woman has finally gained an ally in her war on open oil pits.

toc_entry.title: Sacred Meets Profane
toc_entry.subtitle: Art
toc_entry.description: Benito Huerta reconciles the religious and the worldly in powerful new works at Houston’s Contemporary Arts Museum.

toc_entry.title: The Roar Of the Crowd
toc_entry.description: Recruiting for the environmental team; tackling Texas’ education crisis; seeking justice at the Court of Criminal Appeals.

toc_entry.title: Around the State
toc_entry.description: A selective guide to amusements and events.

toc_entry.title: Reporter
toc_entry.description: Kicking the habit in the Randall County Jail; pumping iron at Austin’s laundro-gym; conquering Arlington’s Texas Giant.

toc_entry.title: State Secrets
toc_entry.description: Hunting for hunting land in the Panhandle; hunting for new legal theories in the Supreme Court; hunting for a reason Bill Clements does what he does.
